casebody.data:
BRUNS
v.
BRYANT, et al. 282P16-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Jenny Bruns, for Bruns, Jeremy, et al. Joseph Finarelli, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas M. Woodward, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina, et al. John I. Malone, Jr., Attorney at Law, Brandon D. Zeller, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for USAA. Philip H. Cheatwood, Attorney at Law, Fayetteville, for Bryant, Dalton (Jr.) Jeremy Bruns.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of April 2017 by Plaintiffs to Reject, Dismiss, and Strike Response to Notice of Appeal and Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."
